text: Anfernee is a given name. Notable people with the given name include: *Anfernee Dijksteel (born 1996), Dutch footballer *Anfernee Frederick (born 1996), Dominican footballer *Anfernee Grier (born 1995), American baseball player *Anfernee Jennings (born 1997), American football outside linebacker *Anfernee "Penny" Hardaway (born 1971), American college basketball coach and former professional basketball player *Anfernee Simons (born 1999), American basketball player ==See also== *Anthony, a name pronounced somewhat similarly
title: Anfernee
